name: Wahoo Fitness RPM Speed Sensor ANT+/BT
categories: Mounts and sensors for bike computers
Wiring, sensors and parts for bike computers
description: Sleek, magnet-less solutions for capturing speed data directly from your bike’s front wheel hub.Compatible with both ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart, these sensors connect to both smartphones and bike computers.Easily replaceable CR2032 batteries last up to a year.Simple tool-free installation.IPX7 waterproofing shrugs off even the heaviest rain.In the box: RPM speed sensor, hub mounting option, quick start guide.
